content: available via the wayback machine 1 errata from cheryl23 i did a test chain with 30 + 14 when i did the first row following her instructions i was left with 3 chains at the end she said the pattern repeat was 10 but i only count 9 chains in the parentheses section i think the skip 1 chain after the second double_crochet should be skip 2 chain when i did it like that it all came out even so i think the first row should be > **1 ** single_crochet in 9th chain from hook chain 1 skip 1 > chain single_crochet in next chain chain 3 skip 2 chain double_crochet > in next chain chain 1 skip 1 chain double_crochet in next > chain chain 3 ***skip 2 chain*** single_crochet in next chain chain > 1 skip 1 chain single_crochet in next chain across > until you have fewer than 10 chain left > chain 3 skip 2 chain double_crochet in next chain turn if > you have any chains in the foundation > chain left leave them unworked when > you complete the shawl undo those > chains and weave in the end 1 http //web archive org/web/20110620135314/http //knottie net/index php p=bluejeanshawl
